name: Mark!
description:
This is a game , set in the wild west, about a cowboy named Mark. His girlfriend was kidnapped and he needs to save her! So grab your revolver (or ak-47s) and go find her!

DISCLAIMER!

This game is just a prototype so don't expect too much.

ad or left and right to move
f to hover
w up or space to jump
12345 for different weapons
left click to shoot
